casebody.data:
Stephen FEEKO, Appellant, v. LEHIGH VALLEY RAILROAD COMPANY. No. 10420. United States Court of Appeals Third Circuit. Argued. May 7, 1951. Decided May 10, 1951. Harry R. Kozart, Philadelphia, Pa., for appellant. No oral argument for appellee (Robert W. Sayre, Harry E. Sprogell, Philadelphia, Pa., Saul, Ewing, Remick & Saul, Philadelphia, Pa., on the brief), for appellee.

Before BIGGS, Chief Judge, and MARIS and STALEY, Circuit Judges.

PER CURIAM.

Affirmed in open court.
